notes.content: This interactive is open source. Please contribute on GitHub.
Data and schema are shared on Airtable.

references.content: Centers for Medicare & Medicaid Services. (2023). National Health Expenditures 2023. Retrieved from https://www.cms.gov/Research-Statistics-Data-and-Systems/Statistics-Trends-and-Reports/NationalHealthExpendData/NationalHealthAccountsHistorical.html

Bureau of Economic Analysis. BEA Medical Services by Disease. Retrieved from https://apps.bea.gov/data/special-topics/health-care/viz/diseases/

National Center for Health Statistics. (2022). NCHS Mortality. Retrieved from https://odphp.health.gov/healthypeople/objectives-and-data/data-sources-and-methods/data-sources/national-vital-statistics-system-mortality-nvss-m
